name: Roundabout: Get Me Outta Here Edition
name_original: Roundabout: Get Me Outta Here Edition
description:
You drive around and stuff. Get to the exit, but don't take the wrong off-ramp.

WASD or Arrow keys to move. R to reset if you get flipped.

Made for Ludum Dare 47, "Stuck in a Loop" with Mathemagician, Giraffalope and Progs.
